thread.title: Rose returns in Bulls' 103-102 win over Mavericks
thread.title_full: Rose returns in Bulls' 103-102 win over Mavericks

title: Rose returns in Bulls' 103-102 win over Mavericks
text: Close Image 1 of 4 Chicago Bulls' Derrick Rose (1) goes for a layup against Dallas Mavericks' Charlie Villanueva (3) during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game in Lincoln, Neb., Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. Chicago Bulls' Derrick Rose (1) goes for a layup against Dallas Mavericks' Charlie Villanueva (3) during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game in Lincoln, Neb., Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. Photo: Nati Harnik, AP Image 2 of 4 Chicago Bulls' Derrick Rose (1) goes for a layup against Dallas Mavericks' Zaza Pachulia (27) during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game in Lincoln, Neb., Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. Chicago Bulls' Derrick Rose (1) goes for a layup against Dallas Mavericks' Zaza Pachulia (27) during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game in Lincoln, Neb., Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. Photo: Nati Harnik, AP Image 3 of 4 Dallas Mavericks' Deron Williams (8) is guarded by Chicago Bulls' Tony Snell (20) and Bobby Portis (5) during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game in Lincoln, Neb., Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. Dallas Mavericks' Deron Williams (8) is guarded by Chicago Bulls' Tony Snell (20) and Bobby Portis (5) during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game in Lincoln, Neb., Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. Photo: Nati Harnik, AP Image 4 of 4 Chicago Bulls' Joakim Noah (13) wrestles for the ball against Dallas Mavericks' Jeremy Evans, second from left, and Dirk Nowitzki (41) with Bulls' Taj Gibson (22) looking on during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game in Lincoln, Neb., Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. Chicago Bulls' Joakim Noah (13) wrestles for the ball against Dallas Mavericks' Jeremy Evans, second from left, and Dirk Nowitzki (41) with Bulls' Taj Gibson (22) looking on during the first half of an NBA ... more Rose returns in Bulls' 103-102 win over Mavericks 1 / 4 Back to Gallery LINCOLN, Neb. (AP) â€” Derrick Rose made his preseason debut, playing just over 10 minutes, and Doug McDermott hit a fallaway jumper with 1 second left to give the Chicago Bulls a 103-102 victory over the Dallas Mavericks on Friday night. Rose played about 5 minutes in both the first and second quarters. He had 8 points on 4-of-6 shooting. Rose had been sidelined since fracturing his left orbital bone on Sept. 29. Bulls: Taj Gibson had 16 points and seven rebounds while Tony Snell and Nikola Mirotic had 14 points each. Mavericks: Dirk Nowitzki led the Mavs with 19 points. Dwight Powell had 14 points and grabbed nine rebounds. Zaza Pachulia had 12 points and seven rebounds. Up next: The Bulls will host Cleveland to open the regular season Tuesday. Dallas will open the regular season at Phoenix on Wednesday. Southeast Texas sports news
